img_above_text:
![Wukong Karma 7.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e8/Wukong_Karma_7.jpg)
Perform the Circle of Fire Spell to warm him up, and he'll thank you, while giving you more clues to the location of a secret Melon Field.
img_below_text:
This secret spot can be found by going right down the hill from the Forest of Felicity and down to the end of the Brook of Bliss' stream.
![Wukong Brook 11.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/ac/Wukong_Brook_11.jpg)
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Karma 7.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e8/Wukong_Karma_7.jpg)
Perform the Circle of Fire Spell to warm him up, and he'll thank you, while giving you more clues to the location of a secret Melon Field."
        - Following Text: "This secret spot can be found by going right down the hill from the Forest of Felicity and down to the end of the Brook of Bliss' stream.
![Wukong Brook 11.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/ac/Wukong_Brook_11.jpg)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a snowy landscape with a character standing near a serene, reflective body of water surrounded by trees and rocky terrain. The character appears to be holding a staff-like weapon and is interacting with the environment, as indicated by the "Gentian x2" text on the screen, suggesting resource collection. This scene likely ties into the preceding context of warming up a character with the Circle of Fire Spell and the following clue about locating the secret Melon Field near the Brook of Bliss.
